summary: The headline numbers for Equinix (EQIX) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended September 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Equinix (EQIX) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Actual results may vary significantly from those statements, may be affected by the risks we identified in today's press release as well as those identified in our filings with the SEC including our most recent Form 10-Ks filed on 02/12/2025 and our most recent Form 10-Q. Equinix assumes no obligation and does not intend to update or comment on forward-looking statements made on this call.  In addition, in light of Regulation Fair Disclosure, it is our policy not to comment on its financial guidance during the quarter unless it is done through an explicit public disclosure.

headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- ABB Australia/
summary: ABB, in collaboration with IPD, is transforming the data centre landscape with cutting-edge ultra-low harmonic (ULH) variable speed drives (VSDs), delivering unmatched energy efficiency, reliability, and sustainability for mission-critical infrastructure.

headline: Equinix (EQIX) Q3 FFO Surpass Estimates
summary: Equinix (EQIX) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +6.16% and -0.32%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Equinix: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Redwood City, California-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $965 million, or $9.83 per share, in the period. The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $9.26 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry.

Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry.

headline: Data center operator Equinix lowers 2025 revenue forecast, facing deal-closure delays
summary: Though Equinix has been expanding its business with artificial intelligence cloud providers, it is heavily reliant on enterprise clients, spending from whom can be lumpy in the face of macroeconomic uncertainty.  Equinix is in discussions to lease the entirety of one of its campuses to a client but is running into delays closing the agreement, CEO Adaire Fox-Martin told Reuters.

headline: Equinix Declares Quarterly Dividend on Its Common Stock
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $4.69 per share on its common stock. The quarterly common stock dividend will be paid on December 17, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 19, 2025.

headline: 'Huge vote of confidence' as data centre giant announces £4bn British investment
summary: A £4bn data centre investment in the UK by one of the industry's biggest companies has been confirmed today, Sky News can reveal.  The money is being put up by Equinix - one of the most significant players on the global stage when it comes to providing data centre space for other clients.  The 85-acre site in South Mimms, Hertfordshire, would have 250 megawatts of processing capacity and aim to be up and running by 2030.

headline: Baron Real Estate Income Fund Q3 2025 Top Contributors And Detractors
summary: In Q3, Welltower shares, operator of senior housing, life science, and medical office real estate properties, continued to significantly outperform both the REIT and broader equity indices.
